title: major credit bureaus
extract: There are several credit reporting agencies in the U.S., but most people are familiar with the big three:Equifax: P.O. Box 740241, Atlanta, GA 30374-0241, 1-800-685-1111.Experian: P.O. Box 2104, Allen, TX 75013-0949, 1-888-EXPERIAN (397-3742)TransUnion - P.O. Box 1000, Chester, PA 19022, 1-800-916-8800.Nov 6, 2018
extract_html:
There are several credit reporting agencies in the U.S., but most people are familiar with the big three:
  • Equifax: P.O. Box 740241, Atlanta, GA 30374-0241, 1-800-685-1111.
  • Experian: P.O. Box 2104, Allen, TX 75013-0949, 1-888-EXPERIAN (397-3742)
  • TransUnion - P.O. Box 1000, Chester, PA 19022, 1-800-916-8800.
Nov 6, 2018
